ya me dolió la cabeza con tantos portales :D.
Aparte de eso si no quieres una convulsión mental, después de muchos minutos o horas sin poder pasar una parte tan sencilla, RECOMENDADÍSIMO 100/10 el juego.

un juego que siempre te pone a pensar ya sea con una nueva mecanica o con las que ya hay, ya que incluso al acabar la campaña solo y multijugador hay un modo que comparte mapas creados por la comunidad
10/10 you need to try this game
Such a good game, it feels like you can go forever by just repeating it over and over, so much fun and i definitely recommend it to anyone. price is so cheap for the quality and fun :)

Does this game even need another review? Probably not. But I'll give my 2 cents anyways. 
Easily falls somewhere on the Top 10 video games of all time. 
It's like... close to necessary to play Portal and Portal 2 and finish it one before you die. 
As far as replayability goes though....
You have to give it like a 2-3 year hiatus between playthroughs to make it worthwhile. You will never recapture the magic of playing through it for the first time. Sadly.
I like this game very funny

Really fun, challenges your brain, and after you've finished the story mode you can play to Co-Op with your friends or create your own map. If you haven't played a portal game its a must.

When life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don't want your damn lemons, what the heck am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life's manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I'm the man who's gonna burn your house down! With the lemons! I'm gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!

It was such a great game. The storyline, characters, puzzles etc. It is a well done game. Also boss fights are really entertaining and cool.

Such a great game. Never played a Valve game before but chose just a random one that looked cool and really really enjoyed it. The puzzels were difficult, but overtime I really got the hang of it. I also loved the storyline and all of the character's especially Wheatley's humor.

This game was very well made for when it came out and I think that compared to the previous game, they have done very well on the design making it as realistic as it could go and honestly if they support this game with NVIDIA Ray Tracing I cannot wait to see how far this will go.
Sehr Unterhaltsames Spiel, man muss manchmal auch wirklich Nachdenken wie Schaffe ich jetzt diesen Raum. Desweiteren schön das die Entwickler den 2. teil mit weiteren Spielmechaniken erweitert haben.
